history.proof: intros x y Hx Hxy. apply Z.le_0_sub. sauto q: on depth: 3use: Z.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Z Hx : 0 < x Hxy : 0 <= x * y Unable to unify "(?M1437 * ?M1438 ?= 0) = Gt" with "(0 ?= 0) = Gt".
In environment x, y : Z Hx : 0 < x Hxy : 0 <= x * y Unable to unify "0 <= 1" with "0 <= x * y".

original: intros x y Hx Hxy. apply Z.le_0_sub. apply Z.le_trans with (Z.mul x y). - apply Z.le_trans with 0. + apply Z.mul_nonpos_nonneg; auto. + apply Z.le_0_1. - auto.
